name: UpsSlideshow

screenshots.caption: Most of the user-interface with the menu and progressbar switched on

short_description:
Originally I wanted a program to swiftly browse through a number of photographs in order to choose one or more for a particular purpose and my ideal is still not a program to watch pictures, but rather a utility to select and treat image-files individually. 

The name UpsSlideshow is inspired by my old nickname "Ups" (pronounced Oops and for much the same reason).

This C++/Qt source-code compiles and runs on Linux- and Windows-machines, provided, the Qt-development files (version 4.7+) are present on the same system.
To compile UpsSlideshow, execute the following 2 commands in the expanded program-folder: 
* qmake
* make

For more details, see on my web-site: http://www.uplawski.eu/technology/upsslideshow

I accept donations. The money will help me renovate a farm-house and barn, install our domestic wet-park, acquire animals and more... Ask me. ;-)
